textBeforeTable: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 19 YEARS Target: VERBAL INSTRUCTIONS TO SP: Please select Yes, No. English Instructions: The following questions are about cigarette smoking and other tobacco use. Have you ever tried cigarette smoking, even 1 or 2 puffs? English Text: Ever tried cigarette smoking SAS Label: SMQ620 Variable Name: SMQ620 - Ever tried cigarette smoking Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS Target: Respondent sequence number. English Text: Respondent sequence number SAS Label: SEQN Variable Name: SEQN - Respondent sequence number Codebook and Frequencies N/A. References A subset of these questions, in addition to more detailed questions on cigarette or tobacco use, were asked of adults 20 years of age and older during the MEC CAPI Interview and the household interview. MEC ACASI Questionnaire In addition, a complete set of questions on tobacco use was obtained for adults 20+ years of age during the household interview. The SMQ questions were also collected for youths 12–19 years as part of the MEC audio-computer-assisted interview (ACASI) interview component. MEC CAPI Questionnaire Analytic Notes All survey participants ages
